info.name: Settingwala API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Settingwala application based on API documentation

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John Doe Updated",
    "contact_number": "9876543211",
    "gender": "male",
    "date_of_birth": "1995-05-15",
    "interests": ["music", "travel", "photography", "cooking"],
    "expectation": "Looking for meaningful connections and friendships"
}

{
    "is_public_profile": true,
    "show_contact_number": false,
    "show_date_of_birth": true,
    "hide_dob_year": true,
    "show_interests_hobbies": true,
    "show_expectations": true,
    "show_gallery_images": true,
    "is_time_spending_enabled": true,
    "is_couple_activity_enabled": false,
    "interested_in_sugar_partner": false,
    "hide_sugar_partner_notifications": true
}

{
    "booking_notifications": true,
    "chat_notifications": true,
    "payment_notifications": true,
    "promotional_notifications": false,
    "email_notifications": false,
    "push_notifications": true
}

variable.description: Base URL for the Settingwala API
